name: HEARTRAID
description:
Only works with controller! Tested with a Nintendo Switch Pro Controller, a PS4, PS5 & Xbox One controller, let me know if other controllers work or don't work. 

A boss fight against a monster trying to take over your heart

Originally a pulse sensor based game, with realtime connection with an Arduino & a pulse sensor to read your actual heartrate which would influence the game. 

 This is a version that works without the need of an Arduino or pulse sensor and has a pre-made heartrate.
